original_text: As he approached Bethphage and Bethany at the hill called the Mount of Olives, he sent two of his disciples, saying to them,
korean_text: 감람원이라 불리는 산쪽에 있는 벳바게와 베다니에 가까이 가셨을 때에 제자 중 둘을 보내시며

sentences.original_text: As he approached Bethphage and Bethany
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 벳바게와 베다니에 가까이 갔을 때

sentences.original_text: at the hill called the Mount of Olives
he sent two of his disciples
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 제자 두 사람을 보냈다
